articles.author: Lee Berthiaume
articles.title: Ukraine war sparks fresh calls for urgency on upgrading North America's defences - CTV News
articles.description: Russian President Vladimir Putin's decision to put his country's nuclear arsenal on high alert last weekend has sparked hope that Ottawa and Washington will finally act with urgency in upgrading North America's defences.
articles.content:
